g.text: Were the police informed of the incident?
Is the incident the subject of a police investigation?
Is the incident the subject of an internal investigation?
Was a visitor suspected of involvement and arrested by the police?
To which police station was the visitor taken to?
Is any member of staff facing disciplinary charges?
Is there any media interest in this incident?
Has the prison service press office been informed?
To which police station are seized drugs sent for destruction?
Is the location of the incident known?
What was the location of the incident?
Describe how the drug or equipment was found
Has any prosecution taken place or is any pending?
Is the incident subject to a governor's adjudication?
Is the method of entry of drug/equipment into the establishment known?
Describe the drug/equipment method of entry into the establishment
Describe the type of temporary release
Local with BDH kit or similar
Is this incident associated with an assault?
Were the drugs obtained on temporary release?
